description:
Every time I see a dude fuck like a jack hammer, my first thought is getting Beau in there to take a pounding.
I'd never actually seen Phenix fuck before, and after I saw him do a marathon with Saber, I knew I wanted to put him with Beau.
Both guys have lots of experience, so I was actually pushing the positions to some more crazy ones. Though I have to admit, fucking Beau upside down so that he practically cums on his face was worth the yoga session they were doing. (Poor Phenix, his leg were sore after this one!)
It's a pretty amazing bust shot too!
There's a silly "Jr. High Play the Movie Backwards cuz it Friday" out take at the end.
title: Beau & Phenix - Wrapped
